nodes.text: Whorm Loathsom's army was an army of battle droids commanded by General Whorm Loathsom during the final acts of the Battle of Christophsis. While Loathsom had commanded numerous droid armies throughout the battle, this force arrived on Christophsis later. However, the army was eventually defeated by the Galactic Republic.

Loathsom's army incorporated Single Trooper Aerial Platforms, NR-N99 Persuader-class droid enforcers, Octuptarra tri-droids and Armored Assault Tanks. It also made use of several different models of battle droids, including B1-series battle droids, B2-series super battle droids, LR-57 combat/retail droids, DSD1 dwarf spider droids, and at least one droideka.
